name: Road Construction-City Builder
description:
Do you like thinking about construction of city buildings & roads with heavy construction machinery. A better challenge may be constructing a road on offroad uphill area. Building a road on mega city construction sites in this road construction game. This construction simulator has heavy machinery like cranes, excavators, dozers & backhoe to help you construct roads in this road construction simulator. The construction crane simulator lets you build roads and build an amazing and mega city.

In this game there are 2 drivers who are on a race but the race stops due to under construction road, so they have to wait until you construct the road with heavy machinery by yourself after that the race will be begun again.

This road construction game is going to give you real road construction experience with all the steps. You may also need to transport road construction material in this uphill construction game. Use the cranes and heavy excavator carefully.
